Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.SqliteDAOs

Class SqliteViewUserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302simplestock.model.SqliteDAOs.SqliteViewUserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IViewUserDAO
public class SqliteViewUserDAO extends Object implements IViewUserDAO
Sqlite implementation of the ViewUser DAO interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SqliteViewUserDAO()
    Connects to the Sqlite database and creates the viewUser table, if it doesn't exist.

  • Constructor Details

    • SqliteViewUserDAO

      public SqliteViewUserDAO()
      Connects to the Sqlite database and creates the viewUser table, if it doesn't exist.

  • Method Details

    • addViewUser

      public int addViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      Adds a viewUser to the Sqlite database. The viewUser ID is set automatically by the database.
      Specified by:
      addViewUser in interface IViewUserDAO
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser that should be added to the database.
      Returns:

    • updateViewUser

      public void updateViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      Updates a viewUser that already exists in the database. The viewUser is chosen by its ID value. If no viewUser with that ID exists nothing is updated in the database.
      Specified by:
      updateViewUser in interface IViewUserDAO
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser that should be updated.

    • deleteViewUser

      public void deleteViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      Deletes a viewUser in the Sqlite database, looks for the type with the same ID as the parameter one. No other checks other than the ID is made.
      Specified by:
      deleteViewUser in interface IViewUserDAO
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser to be deleted. The ID value should be set to the ID value for the viewUser to be deleted.

    • getAllViewUsers

      public List<ViewUser> getAllViewUsers()
      Gets every viewUser stored in the database, does no checks for the viewUsers.
      Specified by:
      getAllViewUsers in interface IViewUserDAO
      Returns:
      A list of all viewUsers in the Sqlite database.

    • getViewUsersByGroupID

      public List<ViewUser> getViewUsersByGroupID(int groupID)
      Specified by:
      getViewUsersByGroupID in interface IViewUserDAO
